mods.loaderExplanation:
‚Ä¢ Loader: type of mod. There are three: Fabric/Quilt, Forge, and NeoForge. They do not mix.
‚Ä¢ Minecraft version: mods must be for the same version (e.g. 1.21.6).
‚Ä¢ Dependencies: other mods needed to work (e.g.: fabricloader).
mods.disableIncompatibleText: This will disable mods that do not match the main version or the active loader.
mods.hiddenIncompatibleMods: Incompatible mods hidden in the list.

settings.name: Name
settings.ramMaxTip: Do not exceed 50% of total RAM

settings.syncWorldsAutomatically: Sync worlds automatically when closing the game
settings.autoSyncDescription: When enabled, your worlds will automatically back up to Google Drive each time you close Minecraft. Battly will stay in the background until the copy is complete and will notify you when finished.
settings.javaConfigDescription: In this section you can configure the Java version that will be used to start your game.
settings.javaPathDescription: Battly uses an integrated version of Java (official). You can specify a different one if you need it.
settings.javaVersionsDescription: Click on a version to use it. If it appears in red, you can download it instantly.
settings.versionNotDownloaded: The version {version} is not downloaded. Do you want to download it now?
settings.keepWindowOpen: Keep the window open while Java is being downloaded and extracted.
settings.javaTextInfo:
Java

In this section you can configure the Java version that will be used to start your game. If you don't know what you're doing, don't change anything here.

Java Path
Battly uses an integrated version of Java [Official].
settings.javaTextInfo2: This version is available at the path However, you can specify your own executable if your version requires a different Java.
settings.ramTextInfo:
In this section you can configure the RAM assigned to your game. This is important for your game to work correctly. If you don't know what you're doing, don't change anything here.

Maximum RAM: Indicates the total amount of RAM assigned to your game. It is recommended not to exceed 50% of the total RAM on your PC. If your PC has more than 8GB of RAM, assign 3GB. If your PC has 4GB or less, do not assign more than 2GB.

Minimum RAM: Indicates the minimum amount of RAM assigned when starting your game. It is recommended not to set more than 3GB for this value. The typical value is 1GB.
settings.battlySettingsInformation: In this section you can configure Battly's general settings
settings.battlySettingsWhatToDo: What to do when opening Minecraft:

settings.changingLanguageText: Battly will restart in a few seconds to apply the selected language.
settings.battlyThemeText: Welcome to the new Battly customization panel! Here you can customize Battly to your liking, changing the theme, background images, and much more. We hope you like it!

logs.logsDescription: Here you can view the logs generated by Battly. If you have any issues, you can copy these logs and send them to support for help.

premium.premiumDescription: Enjoy all the benefits of Battly+ and help support the project.

crash.notificationCrashReportText: Check the error by opening Battly
crash.thatsAErrorMessage: This is an error message when starting Minecraft. This is not Battly's fault, do not report this issue.
crash.searchingSolutionTaking1: It's taking longer than usual, please wait...
crash.searchingSolutionTaking3: We're having trouble finding a solution, please try again later.
crash.noSolutionFound: No solution was found for this problem. You can try searching Google for the error you received.

loader.applyingPatches: Installing loader, this may take a while...

slide0.title: Battly 3.0 is here!
slide0.subtitle: The biggest update so far
slide0.intro: We have worked for months to bring you the best gaming experience. Discover all the new features we have prepared for you.

slide1.title: Battly Servers
slide1.subtitle: Create local servers with a domain
slide1.description: Create your own Minecraft servers with a custom domain, totally free and with no limits.

slide2.title: Battly x Google Drive
slide2.subtitle: Sync your worlds to the cloud
slide2.description: Automatically sync your worlds with Google Drive and access them from any device.

feature1.title: Automatic sync
feature1.desc: Your worlds are automatically saved to the cloud

feature2.title: Multi-device
feature2.desc: Play on different PCs without losing your progress

feature3.title: World recovery
feature3.desc: Restore your worlds if something goes wrong

feature4.title: Unlimited space
feature4.desc: Use your own Google Drive without limits

slide3.title: Battly Music 2.0
slide3.subtitle: Completely redesigned
slide3.description: A renewed music experience with new features, better interface, and cloud sync.

feature2.title: More settings
feature2.desc: Edit playlists, reorder songs, and more

feature3.title: Cloud sync
feature3.desc: Your playlists on all your devices

feature4.title: AI recommendations
feature4.desc: Battly analyzes your tastes and recommends music

feature6.title: Import playlists
feature6.desc: Import public playlists with their URL

slide4.title: Battly Mods
slide4.subtitle: Completely renewed system
slide4.description: A new mods system with advanced search, loader filters, and integrated modpacks.

category1.title: üé® New design
category1.desc: Completely renewed and more intuitive interface

category2.title: üîç Advanced search
category2.desc: Filter by mods, resourcepacks, shaders, datapacks, and more

category3.title: ‚öôÔ∏è Loader filters
category3.desc: Search by Forge, Fabric, Quilt, NeoForge, etc.

category4.title: üì¶ Integrated modpacks
category4.desc: Search and install modpacks directly from Battly

slide4.info: CurseForge modpacks must be downloaded externally due to license restrictions.

improvement1.title: Customize the view
improvement1.desc: Now you can choose how your instances are displayed

improvement2.title: Skins working
improvement2.desc: Skins are now displayed correctly in instances

improvement3.title: Stable ModPacks
improvement3.desc: Issues with modpacks like RLCraft have been fixed

feature1.title: Completely new design
feature1.desc: Modern and elegant interface for downloading and playing

feature2.title: Specific loader versions
feature2.desc: Choose the exact version of Forge, Fabric, etc.

feature3.title: Recent versions
feature3.desc: Quickly access the last 3 played versions

improvement1.title: üéì Interactive tutorial
improvement1.desc: Complete tutorial the first time you open Battly

improvement2.title: üé® Automatic skins
improvement2.desc: Battly automatically deletes the skins folder

improvement3.title: ‚öôÔ∏è Improved ModLoaders
improvement3.desc: Forge and NeoForge now have fewer issues

improvement5.title: üì¥ Improved offline mode
improvement5.desc: The offline system should no longer fail

improvement6.title: ‚òï Optimized Java
improvement6.desc: Improvements in external versions related to Java

improvement7.title: üåç Optimized languages
improvement7.desc: Faster and more efficient language system

improvement8.title: ‚ö° 100% faster startup
improvement8.desc: Battly now starts twice as fast

slide8.title: And much more!
slide8.subtitle: Battly 3.0 is here to revolutionize your experience
slide8.message: We have worked for over a year to bring you the best update so far. We hope you enjoy Battly 3.0.

finish.title: Welcome to Battly 3.0!
finish.text: You have completed the tour. Enjoy all the new features!

welcome.title: Welcome to Battly!
welcome.text: To get started, you need to log in with your account.

importantFile.content:
üéâ Welcome to Battly 3.0!

‚ú® Thank you for using Battly Launcher.

üìù Important notes:
‚Ä¢ This launcher is in constant development
‚Ä¢ If you find any bugs, report them on our Discord
‚Ä¢ Visit https://battlylauncher.com for more information

üéÆ Enjoy playing!

- Battly Team

card4.title: Now you can disable and re-enable mods
card4.subtitle: More improvements in instance management
card4.content: Another of the most requested features by the community was to be able to disable mods without having to delete them. Now it's possible.

card5.title: New update system
card5.subtitle: A fast, easy, and automatic method
card5.content: To update Battly you normally had to download the installer again. Now updates are downloaded automatically.

card6.title: Battly Music
card6.subtitle: Now available again
card6.content: YouTube is constantly changing how its API works. We've adjusted the system to keep working correctly.

card7.title: And finally... See Minecraft news
card7.subtitle: Option that already existed in the old version of Battly
card7.content: For true Minecraft enthusiasts who like to stay updated, now you can see Minecraft news directly in Battly.

servers.title: Battly Servers
servers.welcomeBack: Welcome back, {user}! Connecting to your server {server}...
servers.domainNotAllowed: Domain not allowed! It cannot contain words like api, server, official, battly.
servers.generalDesc: View and control your server's main information.
servers.resourcesDesc: Monitor CPU and RAM usage with area charts
servers.playersDesc: Control and view information for each player.
servers.playerHistoryDesc: List of players who have joined the server.
servers.settingsDesc: Configure your server in detail. Each option shows its variable and current value.
servers.modloadersDesc: Install or update versions of Forge, Fabric, Spigot, Paper, etc.
servers.filesDesc: Upload, manage and edit your files: plugins, mods, configurations, etc.
servers.logsDesc: Review, download and analyze historical logs or crash files.

tour.homeMenuText: This is the Battly home menu. Here you can see the latest news, your online friends, and access any Battly section.
tour.newsText: Here you can see the latest Battly and Minecraft news. Whenever there's something new, we'll let you know.
tour.newsToggleText: Here you can toggle between Battly news and Minecraft news.
tour.onlineFriendsText: Here you can see your online friends. If you have friends online, you'll see them here.
tour.battlyStatusText: Here you can see Battly's status. If there's any problem with Battly, we'll let you know here.
tour.playVersionsText: To play a Minecraft version, simply select the version you want and press the play button.

friends.welcomeText: Here you can manage your friends, see who's online, and chat with them.
friends.searchText: Use this bar to search among your friends by name.
friends.filtersText: Filter your friends by status: all, online, offline, or favorites.
friends.addFriendText: Click here to add new friends by typing their username.
friends.friendCardText: Each card shows your friend's status. Right-click to see more options like chat or remove.
friends.viewModesText: Switch between grid or list view according to your preference.
friends.finishText: You now know the basics of the friends system. Start connecting with your friends!

mods.welcomeText: Here you can search, download, and install mods, resource packs, shaders, and modpacks for your instances.
mods.searchText: Type the name of the mod you're looking for and press Enter or the search button.
mods.filtersText: Filter by content type: mods, resource packs, shaders, modpacks, and more.
mods.loaderText: Select the specific loader: Forge, Fabric, Quilt, NeoForge, etc.
mods.versionText: Filter by specific Minecraft versions you need.
mods.sortText: Sort results by relevance, downloads, recent updates, etc.
mods.localModsText: Access your locally installed mods and manage them from here.
mods.finishText: You now know how to use the mods system. Customize your gaming experience!

settings.welcomeText: Here you can customize Battly to your liking: accounts, themes, performance, and more.
settings.accountsText: Add, remove, or switch between your Minecraft accounts (Microsoft, Battly Offline).
settings.themeText: Change colors, backgrounds, and Battly's appearance according to your preferences.
settings.ramText: Adjust the amount of RAM dedicated to Minecraft to improve performance.
settings.javaText: Select the Java version you want to use to run Minecraft.
settings.launcherText: Configure options like closing the launcher when starting the game, language, etc.
settings.finishText: You now know the main options of My Battly. Customize your experience!

custom.vanillaDescription: The original version of Minecraft. No modifications.

homePanel.followNews: You can follow all news related to the server here.
homePanel.cannotConnectToNews:
Cannot connect to news server.
Please check your internet connection
